name: Sweet Bro and Hella Jeff Tumblr Dashboard Theme!
description:
A full SBaHJ theme for your Tumblr Dashboard! Comes complete with a snazzy compilation of various panels, the original icons, and a comic sans tumblr logo! Have fun!
Icons and panels from http://www.mspaintadventures.com/sweetbroandhellajeff/
Made by http://gr0sse.tumblr.com/
